game_description: Explore a lovingly hand-crafted world full of swift carrots, weirdly aggressive tomatoes, and potatoes who are just trying their best. Unlock lovely new environments! Help a little turnip who works in an office! Decorate a cute home to share with your favorite veggies! And never forget: you're surrounded by friends.
review_1: Really funny and charming game, that's also addicting. Lets you play sitting down or standing. You can play with one-hand or with both hands. Really well designed! I'll come back later and describe more.
review_2: My daughter (7) and I love playing this game. Tons of fun! Creative controls using a watch for different items.
review_3: This game is incredibly fun and cute. All these little vegetables make this game perfect for relaxation and distraction. If you feel bad, this will almost certainly cheer you up.
review_4: This is a wonderful timewaster when you just feel like feeding a bunch a cute little animals
review_5: This game helps me relieve my stress. Itâ€™s amazing!
